plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain %d characters at least。
Password must contain 1 character at least。

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain %d numbers at least。
Password must contain 1 number at least。

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain %d specific symbols at least。
Password must contain 1 specific symbol at least。

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain %d characters at least。
Password must contain 1 non-letter character at least。

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain %d lower-case letters at least。
Password must contain 1 lower-case letter at least。

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain %d upper-case letters at least。
Password must contain 1 upper-case letter at least。
